title: Make way for ducklings
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Morton Schindel
brief_description: Animated story adapted from the book by Robert McClosky. Mr and Mrs Mallard are looking for a home. They finally choose a cosy place in the bushes beside a river in Boston, where their ducklings are hatched. One day Mrs Mallard takes her ducklings across to the park to meet Mr Mallard. Traffic is held up for them by friendly policemen.
